document.full_text: rangers goalkeeper allan mcgregor saved a late penalty from celtic striker georgios samaras on sunday to ensure that the old firm derby in glasgow ended in a tie.
document.title: celtic 0, rangers 0 : samaras penalty saved as celtic and rangers draw
lines_and_colors: rangers goalkeeper allan mcgregor saved a late penalty from celtic striker georgios samaras on sunday to ensure that the old firm derby in glasgow ended in a tie.
